plot: Dipper, Mabel, Stan, and Soos accidentally fall into the Mystery Shack's bottomless pit and tell each other stories to pass the time.

Dipper, Mabel, Soos, and Stan accidentally fall into the Shack's Bottomless Pit. To pass the time, they tell stories about when Dipper's voice changed, when Soos had to play a life-or-death pinball match, and when Mabel gave Stan a set of magical teeth.—Allison
